Name: SnapOn
Description: Identifies whether or not the site gets snapped to the steram grid. 0 = don't snap, 1 = snap

Name: BatchDone
Description: Identified whether or not the point has been processed by the Batch Waterhsed Delineation tool. 0 = unprocessed, 1 = processed

Name: SrcType
Description: Defines the point type. 0 = outlet, 1 = inlet

Name: Name
Description: The unique ID assigned to the watershed
